ðŸ“– Summary: ACI.dev is an open-source platform that simplifies AI agent development by providing access to over 600 pre-built tool integrations. It offers multi-tenant authentication, granular permissions, and dynamic tool discovery, accessible through a Unified MCP server or a lightweight SDK. This allows developers to build production-ready AI agents and automate DevOps tasks without infrastructure complexities.
